name: Health Institute for Mother and Child (Mamta)

address: MAMTA HEALTH INSTITUTE FOR MOTHER AND CHILD  B-5

briefDescription: MAMTA, a movement initiated by a renowned pediatrician, Dr Sunil Mehra, began by designing interventions for the underprivileged communities in Tigri, an urban slum in New Delhi in the year 1990. Registered on December 28th 1990, MAMTA envisioned itself as a leading national and global organization supporting and advocating for rights of the marginalized communities. Since its inception, MAMTA has embarked on a set of initiatives focusing on building capacities, forging partnerships, creating networks and actions that advance political commitment and investment in health and rights of the marginalized.
